name: Requirements-to-Design Copilot
tagline: Accelerates translation of requirements into engineering specifications
overview: The Requirements-to-Design Copilot assists engineers in converting customer and regulatory requirements into detailed engineering specifications. It analyzes requirements documents, identifies gaps and conflicts, suggests design parameters, and helps ensure traceability throughout the development process.
whatItDoes: Parses and structures requirements from multiple sources
Identifies gaps, conflicts, and ambiguities in requirements
Suggests design parameters based on similar past projects
Maps requirements to test cases and validation criteria
Maintains traceability between requirements and design decisions
prompts: Analyze these customer requirements and identify any conflicts
What design parameters were used for similar emission requirements?
Generate test criteria for this durability requirement
Flag any requirements that lack clear acceptance criteria
Map these regulatory requirements to our standard design checklist

impact.description: Faster identification of issues and gaps
Fewer downstream changes due to missed requirements
